Device.title: Device
Device.description: Represents a user's registered Android device.

uid.description: The UID of the user who owns the device.

androidVersion.description: The Android version of the device.

battery.description: The current battery level of the device.

isOnline.description: The online status of the device.

fcmToken.description: The FCM token for sending push notifications.

lastSeen.description: The last time the device was seen online.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the device was registered.

networkStatus.description: The network status of the device.

DeviceFile.title: DeviceFile
DeviceFile.description: Represents a file transferred from a device.

deviceId.description: The ID of the device this file belongs to.

size.description: The size of the file in bytes.

type.description: The MIME type of the file.

storagePath.description: The path to the file in Firebase Storage.

uploadedAt.description: The timestamp when the file was uploaded.

DeviceLocation.title: DeviceLocation
DeviceLocation.description: Represents the location of a device.

accuracy.description: The accuracy of the location in meters.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the location was recorded.

DeviceNotification.title: DeviceNotification
DeviceNotification.description: Represents a notification synced from a device.

deviceId.description: The ID of the device this notification is from.

appName.description: The name of the app that sent the notification.

appIcon.description: An identifier for the app icon.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the notification was received.

DeviceCommand.title: DeviceCommand
DeviceCommand.description: Represents a command to be sent to a device.

deviceId.description: The ID of the target device.

type.description: The type of command to execute.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the command was created.

/files/{fileId}.description: Stores metadata about files uploaded from devices.

/locations/{deviceId}.description: Stores the last known location of a device.

/commands/{commandId}.description: Stores commands to be executed on devices.
